block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Active Power Inc., Austin, Tex., an initial public offering of 8 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Active Power Inc., Austin, Tex., an initial public offering of 8 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Advanced Power Technology Inc., Bend, Ore., an initial public offering of 3.5 million shares. Stephens Inc.
America Online Latin America Inc., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., an initial public offering of 25 million class A shares. Salomon Smith Barney and Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
American Medical Systems Holdings Inc., Minnetonka, Minn., an initial public offering of 6.3 million shares. US Bancorp Piper Jaffray.
American States Water Co., San Dimas, Calif., 1 million shares. PaineWebber Inc.
Amerigroup Corp., Virginia Beach, Va., an initial public offering of 4.4 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
AtheroGenics Inc., Alpharetta, Ga., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
C-MAC Industries, Montreal, an initial public offering of 10 million shares. Merrill Lynch & Co.
ChipPAC Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 15.5 million class A shares. CS First Boston.
Compugen Ltd., Israel, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Robertson Stevens.
Concours Group, Kingwood, Tex., an initial public offering of 2.5 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Dynacs Inc., Palm Harbor, Fla., an initial public offering of 3 million shares. Wainwright.
Equinix Inc., Redwood City, Calif., an initial public offering of 20 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Esperion Therapeutics Inc., Ann Arbor, Mich., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Robertson Stevens.
Evolve Software Inc., San Francisco, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. CS First Boston.
H Power Corp., Clifton, N.J., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Lehman Brothers.

Ista Pharmaceuticals Inc., Irvine, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
Jack Henry & Associates Inc., Monett, Mo., 5 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Large Scale Biology Corp., Vacaville, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. J. P. Morgan Securities.
Lipman Electronic Engineering Ltd., Rosh Haayin, Israel, an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Robertson Stevens.
Liquor.com Inc., Chicago, Ill., an initial public offering of 3 million units, each unit represents 1 share and 1 redeemable warrant. Dirks.
McData Corp., Broomfield, Colo., an initial public offering of 12.5 million class B shares. CS First Boston.
Medicines Co., Cambridge, Mass., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. J. P. Morgan Securities.
Millennium Cell Inc., Eatontown, N.J., an initial public offering of 3.7 million shares. Morgan Keegan.
MIND C.T.I. Ltd., Yoqneam, Israel, an initial public offering of 4.2 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
New Focus Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., 3.5 million shares. CS First Boston.
Orient-Express Hotels Ltd., Hamilton, Bermuda, an initial public offering of 10 million class A shares, 8 million in the U.S. and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co. and Lazard Freres & Co.
Pemstar Inc., Rochester, Minn., an initial public offering of 8.4 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
PeoplePC Inc., San Francisco, an initial public offering of 11.5 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Pharsight Corp., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.8 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Radview Software Ltd., Burlington, Mass., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Regeneration Technologies Inc., Alachua, Fla., an initial public offering of 5.7 million shares. BancAmerica Securities.
Repeater Technologies Inc., Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.8 million shares. US Bancorp Piper Jaffray.
Saturn Electronics and Engineering Inc., Auburn Hills, Mich., an initial public offering of 12 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Serviceware Technologies Inc., Oakmont, Pa., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Spinnaker Exploration Co., Houston, 4 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Synquest Inc., Norcross, Ga., an initial public offering of 7.2 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
TeleCommunication Systems Inc., Annapolis, Md., an initial public offering of 4.7 million class A shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Talik Inc., San Francisco, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Tvia Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. BancAmerica Securities.
VINA Technologies Inc., Fremont, Calif., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
